Package brave.http

Class HttpServerAdapter<Req,​Resp>

java.lang.Object
brave.http.HttpAdapter<Req,​Resp>
brave.http.HttpServerAdapter<Req,​Resp>
@Deprecated
public abstract class HttpServerAdapter<Req,​Resp>
extends HttpAdapter<Req,​Resp>
Deprecated.
Since 5.10, use HttpServerRequest and HttpServerResponse
